pageProduct.name: Andalou 1000 Roses Heavenly Night Cream 50g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

A heavenly dose of skin nutrition, this velvety cream, with alpine rose stem cells, delivers essential hydration and dermal vitality to soothe and nourish sensitive skin as pomegranate uplifts tone and hyaluronic acid and aloe vera help revive skin's hydro lipid barrier for a flawless looking complexion.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid direct contact with eyes.

Common Uses

Facial Cream For Sensitive & Delicate Skin Types

Ingredients

Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Purified Water (Aqua), Caprylic/Capric Triglycerides, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Glyceryl Stearate, Vegetable Glycerin, Cetyl Alcohol, Plant Stem Cells (Alpine Rose, Malus Domestica, Solar Vitis) and BioActive Berry Complex*, Stearyl Alcohol, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Soothing Complex: [Sodium Hyaluronate, Magnolia Officinalis Bark Extract, Boswellia Serrata (Boswellin) Extract], Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Olive Squalane, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter)*, Bisabolol, Xanthan Gum, Lecithin, Canina (Rosehip) Fruit Oil*, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Seed Oil*, Panthenol, Tocopherol, Allantoin, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vitamin C), Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Distillate*, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Juice*, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract*, Aspalathus Linearis (Rooibos) Extract*, Phenethyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Rose Isolates, Vanilla Isolates, Pelargonium Graveolens (Rose Geranium) Flower Oil*, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil* *Certified Organic Ingredients Fair Trade Ingredients

Directions

Nightly. Apply to clean face and neck.
